plugins.successComment: This ${issue.pull_request ? 'PR is included' : 'issue has been resolved'} in version ${nextRelease.version} :tada:

plugins.publishCmd: export GITHUB_TOKEN='${process.env.GITHUB_TOKEN}'; mvn -B package --file pom.xml && mvn deploy -s ${process.env.SETTINGS_PATH} -DaltDeploymentRepository=github::default::https://maven.pkg.github.com/equinix/equinix-sdk-java
